busdesc: Safeway Inc. operates as a food and drug retailer in the United States.
The Kroger Co. operates as a retailer in the United States. The company operates supermarkets, multi-department stores, marketplace stores, and price impact warehouse stores.

Whole Foods Market, Inc. operates natural and organic foods supermarkets. The company's stores offers produce, grocery, meat and poultry, seafood, bakery, prepared foods, coffee, tea, beer, wine, cheese, nutritional supplements, vitamins, body care, pet foods, and household goods.
Graham Holdings Company, through its subsidiaries, operates as a diversified education and media company worldwide.
R.R. Donnelley & Sons Company, an integrated communications provider, enables organizations to create, manage, deliver, and optimize their multichannel marketing and business communications.
